items.title: Stock market holiday today: BSE, NSE to remain shut for Gandhi Jayanti
items.description: Trading on the NSE and the BSE will resume on October 3.

items.title: Too many red flags; not the time to be aggressive or adventurous in stocks, say leading experts
items.description: Leading experts are unanimous in their view that the recent run-up in the Indian markets has been primarily driven by domestic liquidity with fundamentals lagging far behind and this has created a very brittle scenario.

items.title: How oil can spoil the market party: impact on economy, market sentiment, sectors and stocks
items.description: Recent events point out to a widening escalation that could trigger correction up to 15 percent if Brent breached $85-mark
